body: How many players will be accepted to become Jr. Mods?
body_tagged: How many players will be accepted to become Jr. Mods?
title: Question to Mods.

replies.body: Depends on how many applications are good :P
replies.body_tagged: Depends on how many applications are good :P

replies.body: I assume it depends on how good the applicants are ^-^
replies.body_tagged: I assume it depends on how good the applicants are ^-^

replies.body: It all depends on how many players write a good, solid application, and then pass their interview on TeamSpeak.
replies.body_tagged: It all depends on how many players write a good, solid application, and then pass their interview on TeamSpeak.

replies.body:
Im guessing 200 applications.

Last time about 40 interviews were added to the Skype chat, then around 15 made it.

So Ill guess 50 interviewees, and 20 new staff.
And Ill only be supporting about 10 people.

replies.body: I bet I'm one right? Ehhh? Heheh? Heh... I'll just go now...
